rule.name: GetWait
rule.doc: Get wait DOM from User Status database using the waitId from the TransactionContext

rule.name: ExtractUserClass
rule.doc: Extract the user class from the user XML and store it in the TransactionContext.

rule.name: GetObject
rule.doc: Get Object DOM (mods) from (recordId, objectDb), in recordId mode.

rule.name: ExtractObjectCategroy
rule.doc: Extract the object category from the object XML and store it in the TransactionContext.

rule.name: Lock
rule.doc: Logical lock of UserStatus and ObjectStatus

rule.name: GetProfile
rule.doc: Gets a Profile for the userClass and objectCategory stored in the TransactionContext. It does a strict match or it fails, unless the "priority" parameter is passed in which case it will attempt to use wildcard "*" in the order determined by the priority. The Profile is stored in the TransactionContext under the well-known name "profile" (TransactionContex.PROFILE). Read the javadoc for more information.

rule.name: CheckExpiredWait
rule.doc: Check whether this reservation is expired and possibly generate a fine for the user.

process.name: ProcessWaits
process.doc: Chequea en la cola de waits para ver si hay waits para este objeto sin fecha de confirmación esperando, en caso que si, le asigna fecha de confirmacion

process.name: UpdateDb
process.doc: Updates User/Object Status databases, and stores the cancelled reservation to the transaction log.

finally.name: Unlock
finally.doc: Release the logic locks done at the beginning.
